content: Relying on an external service to host your charts and data can be...unreliable. With Simplechart, it's all under your control.
Pre-configuring a custom color palette and other options can improve your team's workflow and maintain visual consistency.
Simplechart has a WordPress plugin ready to activate, but it's designed for integration with _any_ CMS.
Simplechart data is stored locally, so it's easy to embed a chart just like you would an image.
Simplechart uses up-to-date JavaScript technologies like ES2015, React, and Webpack.
Use Simplechart however you want and contribute back if you like it!
